title: WTB- Christy Mathewson White Cap PSA 5 or better
author: trambo

posts.post_title: WTB- Christy Mathewson White Cap PSA 5 or better
posts.post_content:
Yeah, I know.  Tough card.  I have a 4 and would prefer a 5/6 (or even 7) in my set.  If you have one and you're itching to sell, let me know.  Can also trade my 4 and cash for yours as well.  

PM or email [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] if you'd like to discuss (no, the PSA 4 isn't for sale).

Thanks!
Not until I get a suitable replacement.
